T02D3477:127a-1: ae k'a ksha ra ka ti pa ya pra yo gi /
T02D3477:127a-3: yi ge gcig pa'i rab tu sbyor ba cung zad pa /
T02D3477:127a-4: 'phags pa 'jam pa'i mgon la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3477:127a-5: thlhim zhes pa ni bya ba kun grub nus //
T02D3477:127a-6: rab mchog shin tu gsang pa las kun pa //
T02D3477:127a-7: yi ge gcig pa zhes bya rig sngags rgyal //
T02D3477:127b-0: sems can @127b kun gyi rim las 'da' mi byed //
T02D3477:127b-1: sems can kun gyi mthu dang ni //
T02D3477:127b-2: sems can kun gyi bkra shis te //
T02D3477:127b-3: sgrub pa po yi gsang sngags kun //
T02D3477:127b-4: 'jig rten kun gyi gtso bo ste //
T02D3477:127b-5: nor rnams kun gyi dbang phyug go //
T02D3477:127b-6: sdang ba kun gyi byams bdag nyid //
T02D3477:127b-7: skye bo kun gyi brtse ba can //
T02D3477:127b-8: bgegs rnams thams cad 'joms par byed //
T02D3477:127b-9: mdor bsdus nas ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyor ba de lta de ltar byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D3477:127b-10: ma bsgrub par yang las thams cad byed do //
T02D3477:127b-11: sngags bzlas nas gang la rig pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
T02D3477:127b-12: gos la mngon par bsngags nas gon na skal ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
T02D3477:127b-13: so shing la mngon par bsngags nas zos na so'i zug rngu 'joms par 'gyur ro //
T02D3477:127b-14: ka ra b'i ra dkar po'i shing la lan bdun
T02D3477:127b-15: mngon par bsngags nas zos na ma bslangs par yang
T02D3477:127b-17: mig gi zug rngu la rgya ma tsha phye mar
T02D3477:127b-18: byas nas lan bdun mngon par bsngags te mig tu
T02D3477:127b-19: blugs na mig gi zug rngu 'joms par 'gyur ro
T02D3477:127b-20: // glang po che'i lci ba la sprin las byung
T02D3477:127b-21: ba'i sha mo pa l'aksha'i lo ma la dril nas
T02D3477:127b-22: me chung ngu la bsregs nas legs par blangs te
T02D3477:127b-23: drod bde ba tsam byas nas rgya tsha'i phye ma
T02D3477:127b-24: // dang sbyar te / lan bdun mngon par bsngags
T02D3477:127b-25: nas rna bar blugs na de'i skad cig la zug
T02D3477:127b-27: bud med bu skye ba'i dus su mngal dam zhing
T02D3477:127b-28: zug rngur gyur pa la ba sha ka'i rtsa ba
T02D3477:127b-29: srog chags med pa'i chu la btab nas lte ba'i
T02D3477:127b-30: phyogs su byug pa byas na bde bar skye bar
T02D3477:127b-31: 'gyur ro // rma red can gyi skyes bu la
T02D3477:127b-32: mar rnying pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas
T02D3477:127b-33: 'thungs shing de'i phyogs su byugs na de'i skad cig
T02D3477:127b-34: de la de bzhin du rma red pa med par
T02D3477:127b-35: 'gyur ro // 'gyur ro // ma zhu ba dang /
T02D3477:127b-37: gcong can la yang rva tsha'am tshva la lan bdun
T02D3477:127b-38: mngon par bsngags te bza' bar byas na de nas
T02D3477:127b-39: nad las grol zhing de'i nyin mo nas bde bar
T02D3477:127b-40: 'gyur ro // bu tsha skye ba'i chos ldan ma
T02D3477:127b-41: bu skye bar 'dod na rta dri'i rtsa ba dang
T02D3477:127b-42: ba'i 'o ma mnyes shing bsres te /
T02D3477:127b-43: lan nyi shu rtsa lnga bzlas nas rdul dang ldan pa'i dus su btung bar bya'o //
T02D3477:127b-44: pha rol gyi bud med spangs te rang gi chung
T02D3477:127b-45: ma la mngon par 'gro bar byas na bu skye
T02D3477:127b-46: bar 'gyur ro // rims nyin gcig pa dang /
T02D3477:128a-0: @128a * // rtag pa'i rims rnams la mar dang bcas pa'i thug
T02D3477:128a-1: pa la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags nas zos
T02D3477:128a-3: mkha' 'gro ma dang gdon gyis zin pa rnams la
T02D3477:128a-4: bdag nyid kyi khar brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags
T02D3477:128a-5: nas bltas na bde bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3477:128a-9: gzhon nu'i gdon la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02D3477:128a-10: mi thams cad la gdug pa mi bzad pas zin
T02D3477:128a-11: pa rnams bdag nyid kyi lag pa la brgya rtsa
T02D3477:128a-12: brgyad mngon par bsngags nas bzung zhing mgo bo la
T02D3477:128a-14: lan gcig bzlas na bdag nyid srung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3477:128a-15: gnyis bzlas na srung ba chen por 'gyur ro //
T02D3477:128a-16: gsum bzlas na khyim srung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3477:128a-17: bzhi bzlas na grong srung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3477:128a-18: lnga bzlas na grong khyer srung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3477:128a-19: de bzhin du ji srid drug bzlas na dmag tshogs srung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3477:128a-20: 'di rnams dang gzhan las phra mo ma gsungs pa yang byed do //
T02D3477:128a-21: sngags 'dis de bzhin du bud med kyi mo nad
T02D3477:128a-22: la sogs pa rnams la aa lam mu sha'i rtsa
T02D3477:128a-23: ba lo ma dang mnyes shing brgya rtsa brgyad mngon
T02D3477:128a-24: par bsngags nas 'o ma dang bsres te btung bar
T02D3477:128a-26: ta mtha' ra mtha' yang dag sbyor //
T02D3477:128a-27: sa mtha' ai yi dbyangs kyis mdzes //
T02D3477:128a-28: zla phyed thig les mnan par bri //
T02D3477:128a-29: bla ma'i man ngag blta zhing bzlas //
